title: Ep. 60 - Favorite Child
description:
On today’s show, Todd, Digs, Gorms, and Bailey are holding in down in Indianapolis while the rest of the guys are still on the road in Brooklyn for NXT Takeover and then Wrestlemania. The guys cover whether or not any of them want any kids, and if they know whether or not they are their parents favorite child. Todd and Digs also talk about life at their homes with their dogs, Gorms wonders why Aaron Judge is playing for peanuts for the Yankees, they cover the worst parents in America, including a dad who stole his daughter’s Girl Scout cookie haul. They also talk about Jeff Bezos’ wife becoming one of the richest people in the world and what their first purchase would be if they were to get that type of settlement, and Todd brings back a little Jeff Bezos related Fact or Fiction. As always, the guys all send in some songs to help send you into the weekend the right way with some Friday Bangerz.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @Digz, @HeyGorman, and @baileymccomas.
dc:creator: The Pod
